5: 194,0,194 (0xC200C2)
6: 0,194,194 (0x00C2C2)
7: 194,194,194 (0xC2C2C2)
8: 61,61,61 (0x3D3D3D)
9: 255,61,61 (0xFF3D3D)
10: 61,255,61 (0x3DFF3D)
11: 255,255,61 (0xFFFF3D)
12: 61,61,255 (0x3D3DFF)
13: 255,61,255 (0xFF3DFF)
14: 61,255,255 (0x3DFFFF)
15: 255,255,255 (0xFFFFFF)
